xuiMenuAction
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for menu action. It is used to call some JavaScript method. It can only be used inside xuiMenu directive.

Usage

as element:
<xui-menu-action
       action="{string}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}">
</xui-menu-action>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
actionstring

Value to be executed as JavaScript method.

is-disabledboolean

Expression to determine if menu item should be disabled.

Example
